author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Yes, I would like to, but the Registrator is now Erroring. I tried to adapt the things I read on the other threads, but the Registrator does not like the `Julia="1"` and says that there is no package Julia ( see https://github.com/kellertuer/OpenPixelControl.jl/commit/d0c881fc1ad0a6b79bb67edf7ea209969340669d#commitcomment-33420115 ). But that was for example mentioned in https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/522#issuecomment-489334787. What am I doing wrong?
